name: lyrics-assistant
description: A Progressive Web Application for musicians with automatic lyrics scrolling

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.docker:db: docker run --name lyrics-db -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=password -e POSTGRES_DB=lyrics_assistant -p 5432:5432 -d postgres:14
scripts.docker:db:stop: docker stop lyrics-db && docker rm lyrics-db
